Location: Katani
Commissioned: 2020
System Type: Hybrid Solar PV System

System Overview
Inverter: 5kW Hybrid Inverter
Panels: 6 × 475W Monocrystalline (Total 2.85kWp)
Battery: 4 × 200Ah Lead-Acid Batteries (Approx. 9.6kWh at 12V)
Approx. CO₂ savings: ~1,200 kg per year
